title: Moncler CEO Remo Ruffini Talks 'Genius' Strategy | Inside Fashion
itunes:title: Moncler CEO Remo Ruffini Talks 'Genius' Strategy | Inside Fashion
itunes:subtitle: Speaking in conversation with Imran Amed, the chief executive of Moncler discusses the outerwear brand's game-changing Genius strategy and why the company now feels more like a start-up.Sign up for BoF’s Daily Digest newsletter here: http://bit.ly/BoFn
description:
Speaking in conversation with Imran Amed, the chief executive of Moncler discusses the outerwear brand's game-changing Genius strategy and why the company now feels more like a start-up.

Sign up for BoF’s Daily Digest newsletter here: http://bit.ly/BoFnews.
